fullText: Crystal is a natural raconteur, and his timing is impeccable. He knows exactly when to pause, when to rush, when to whisper and when to boom.
dtliExcerpt: Crystal is a natural raconteur, and his timing is impeccable. He knows exactly when to pause, when to rush, when to whisper and when to boom.
bwwExcerpt: You may not want to miss this chance to see a master entertainer ply his trade - not to mention the rare opportunity to relish real, live Catskills humor on Broadway. (Alan Zweibel, one of the original 'Saturday Night Live' writers, contributed additional material.)
showScoreExcerpt: Crystal is a natural raconteur, and his timing is impeccable. He knows exactly when to pause, when to rush, when to whisper and when to boom.
